posts.message: لو حد يعرف حد شغال عند بتوع الرامات, يخليهم يعملولنا رامات زى الفلاشة كده مبتفصلش لما الكهربا تفصل.. والكمبيوترات تفتح ذى الالة االحاسبة :)

Interesting book. You can download the PDF version for free.

Quoting their site : 

"Visualizing Information for Advocacy is a book about how advocates and activists use visual elements in their campaigns. In this 170-page book we explore how to influence issues using the right combination of information, design, technologies and networks. Through over 60 examples of visual information campaigns from around the world we show how they capture attention, present stories and take us on journeys through data."
posts.caption: visualisingadvocacy.org

posts.message:
السلام عليكم
عملت plugin ل wordpress و اسمها Aljazeera RSS وهى بتجيب آخر الأخبار من موقع aljazeera.net عن طريق RSS و بتعرضها فى Widget مع بعض الoptions.
سجلت الplugin فى موقع wordpress و ممكن تشوفوها و تحملوها على طول من اللينك:
 https://wordpress.org/plugins/aljazeera-rss/
يا ريت لو تجربوها و تفيدونى برأيكم و ده اللينك بتاع github لو حد عايز يغير فيها:
http://github.com/yehiasedkydev/Aljazeera-RSS
و شكرا ليكم

Hi guys, as we all know, PayPal repeatedly announced that it supports Egypt now in both Sending and receiving money. we can see that from their  Offerings website http://goo.gl/iLWxuD.

However, i get "PayPal accounts opened in this country or region currently cannot withdraw funds. We regret any inconvenience this may cause you." Any one successfully received anything from his PayPal and how ??

posts.message: If you rely on user agent strings, perhaps this is why it's a good idea to rethink that approach. I said it once ;) Remember?

posts.message: After being a while with the company of "gulp" I can say it confidently .. if you don't have a task runner -specially gulp- in your development environment .. you are missing a lot of power .. and most importantly a lot of fun  :)
posts.caption: blog.engineyard.com
posts.description: In this post, we discuss how to manage frontend development and deployment using Gulp, a task runner.
